channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Dynamics 365 Field Service (on-premises) v7 series
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Dynamics 365 Field Service (on-premises) v7 series

item.title: CVE-2020-0656|2024-08-04T06:11:04.625Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20365%20field%20service%20%28on-premises%29%20v7%20series
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists when Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises) does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Dynamics server, aka 'Microsoft Dynamics 365 (On-Premise) Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2024-38182|2024-08-02T03:55:23.663Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20365%20field%20service%20%28on-premises%29%20v7%20series
item.description: Weak authentication in Microsoft Dynamics 365 allows an unauthenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network.

item.title: CVE-2024-38182|2024-07-31T23:00:11.224Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20365%20field%20service%20%28on-premises%29%20v7%20series
item.description: Weak authentication in Microsoft Dynamics 365 allows an unauthenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network.

item.title: CVE-2024-38182|2024-08-01T14:36:02.704Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20365%20field%20service%20%28on-premises%29%20v7%20series
item.description: Weak authentication in Microsoft Dynamics 365 allows an unauthenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network.
